articles.description: Liverpool manager Jurgen Klopp, 54, will be relying on the support of his wife, Ulla Sandrock, as the team prepares to face Real Madrid in the Champions League final on Saturday.
articles.content: As Liverpool prepares to face Real Madrid in the Champions League final on Saturday, fans will be looking to their charismatic manager Jurgen Klopp in the hope of realising their dreams of European g… [+10029 chars]
